headline: FDA Flu Setback Tests Moderna Valuation And Future mRNA Vaccine Pipeline
summary: U.S. FDA issues a Refusal to File for Moderna's mRNA flu vaccine BLA, citing concerns with the trial comparator rather than safety or efficacy. Moderna, ticker NasdaqGS:MRNA, says the trial design and comparator were agreed in advance with the FDA, raising questions about changing regulatory expectations. Reports of FDA leadership overruling internal expert staff have drawn attention to potential shifts in U.S. vaccine policy and oversight. For you as an investor, this sits at the core of...
